title: Should American Parents Adopt a More Hands-Off Approach? - Between The Scenes
itunes:title: Should American Parents Adopt a More Hands-Off Approach? - Between The Scenes
description:
“Parents should treat playgrounds, the way people should treat airport carousels…take a step back.” Trevor discusses the difference between American and South African parenting. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
